text: Ani doghejana darakade dhavale. Tya strine yusuphace vastra (sadara) magacya bajune odhuna phadale ani tya strica pati doghanna darasica milala, tevha ti mhanu lagali ki jo manusya tumacya patnisi va'ita iccha dharela, tyaci siksa hica ahe ki tyala kaidi banavile jave kinva dusari ekhadi kathora siksa dili javi
